Licensing - Runtime Licenses for V-Series Frame Grabber

VisualApplets Runtime License for V-Series frame grabber

For running VA Applets on your V-Series frame grabber with microDisplay or within an SDK project you basically do not need a VisualApplets Runtime License, except:

A VisualApplets Runtime License is only required, if you run a VA Applets incorporating VisualApplets operators from VisualApplets operator libraries that are not free of charge (e.g. blob library and compression library).

In this case, to get a specific Runtime License for V-Series products please contact Silicon Software sales department or your local sales representative/distributor.



SmartApplets Runtime License for V-Series frame grabber

SmartApplets Base Family applets (running only on V-Series frame grabber) do not need a Runtime Licence.

SmartApplets Extended Family applets and others (running only on V-Series frame grabber) require a Runtime Licence. To get a specific Runtime License please contact Silicon Software sales department or your local sales representative/distributor.


Licensing your V-Series frame grabber

To license your grabber, please open the microDiagnostics tool which is located below your installation directory within "bin" folder.

At first, the grabber must be chosen that has to be licensed. Just click on it and the button "License Board". Afterwards, another diaglog opens.




Please enter the code you got from Silicon Software into the empty fields or load a license file (*.lic).

The next dialog shows you that your grabber has been correct licensed. Click the OK button and close microDiagnostics to start working with microDisplay and your SDK projects.


Remark: AcquisitionApplets and Advanced AcquisitionApplets do not need a runtime license.
